Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item carries a unique value, tailored to exceed expectations and provide unparalleled benefits. Given its unparalleled quality and versatility, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, we kindly invite you to consider acquiring this product at an exclusive offer of $18000. We are confident that this investment will not only meet but surpass your expectations. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of enhancing your experience with our product. Warm regards, Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $18,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $18,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
